title.narrative: Strengthened local capacity to establish, promote and lead the Child Friendly City Initiative in HCMC

description.narrative: The draft of a new City Plan of Action for Children (2021-2025) for HCMC was developed in line with CFCI global standards. UNICEF influenced the selection of child rights indicators and solutions to negative urbanization impacts on children in the National Plan of Action for Children 2021-2025. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:31/12/2019
